Traits.Name: Explosive End
Traits.Description: When the Pinhead is defeated, it explodes in a blast 1 area effect that deals [D]+fray damage and inflicts frostbite.

Actions.Name: Place Bomb
Actions.Description: The Pinhead places a size 1 summon in a space in range 2 and ends its turn. At the start of the Pinhead's next turn or if the bomb takes any damage, the bomb explodes in a blast 1 area effect that deals 2[D] and inflicts blight.
